meanings.definition: Superlative form of the adjective 'shirty', meaning irritable or bad-tempered.
meanings.sent1: After a long day at work, he was the shirtiest person in the office.
meanings.sent2: She gets shirtiest when she doesn't get enough sleep.
meanings.sent3: The shirtiest cat I've ever seen was not in the mood for cuddles.
meanings.sent4: His shirtiest mood could be compared to a stormy sky.
meanings.sent5: The shirtiest customer at the store demanded to speak to the manager.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of the noun 'shirt', referring to the most shirt-like or shirt-related item.
meanings.sent1: Out of all the clothes in the store, that was the shirtiest one.
meanings.sent2: She always picks the shirtiest outfits for special occasions.
meanings.sent3: The shirtiest shirt in his closet had a unique pattern.
meanings.sent4: The shirtiest fabric for summer is lightweight and breathable.
meanings.sent5: In the costume contest, her shirtiest costume won first place.
